Let $ a$, $ b$, $ c$, $ d$, and $ e$ be positive integers with $ a+b+c+d+e=2010$, and let $ M$ be the largest of the sums $ a+b$, $ b+c$, $ c+d$, and $ d+e$. What is the smallest possible value of $ M$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 670 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 671 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 802 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 803 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 804$
